The Terminal disconnected unexpectedly from the reader.
onUpdateDiscoveredReaders(List<Reader>) - Method in interface com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryListener
This method will be called repeatedly until: - an error occurs - Terminal.discoverReaders(com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryConfiguration, com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryListener, com.stripe.stripeterminal.Callback) is canceled - Terminal.connectReader(com.stripe.stripeterminal.Reader, com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderCallback) is called with a discovered reader You should *not* cache the Reader objects in the readers list.

P

PaymentIntent - Class in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The PaymentIntent represents your intent to collect payment from a customer, tracking the lifecycle of the payment process through each step.
PaymentIntent() - Constructor for class com.stripe.stripeterminal.PaymentIntent
 
PaymentIntent.PaymentIntentStatus - Enum in com.stripe.stripeterminal
A PaymentIntentStatus represents the state that a given PaymentIntent is currently in.
PaymentIntentCallback - Interface in com.stripe.stripeterminal
PaymentIntentCallback is an interface for callbacks that will receive a PaymentIntent under the success case, and an Exception under the failure case.
PaymentIntentParameters - Class in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The PaymentIntentParameters class contains information that will be used for the creation of a new PaymentIntent.
PaymentIntentParameters.Builder - Class in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The PaymentIntentParameters.Builder class provides a convenient way to create a new PaymentIntentParameters instance without having to deal with parameters that aren't relevant to your integration.
PaymentStatus - Enum in com.stripe.stripeterminal
A PaymentStatus represents any of the states that a single payment can be in.

R

Reader - Class in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The Reader is a representation of a physical reader device.
ReaderCallback - Interface in com.stripe.stripeterminal
PaymentIntentCallback is an interface for callbacks that will receive a Reader under the success case, and an Exception under the failure case.
ReaderEvent - Enum in com.stripe.stripeterminal
A ReaderEvent represents any of the possible events you can receive from a connected reader.
ReaderInputListener - Interface in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The ReaderInputListener should be implemented to handle events from the reader that occur while accepting input.
ReaderInputOptions - Class in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The ReaderInputOptions represents the set of ReaderInputOptions.ReaderInputOptions currently available to your user.
ReaderInputOptions.ReaderInputOption - Enum in com.stripe.stripeterminal
A ReaderInputOption represents any of the input methods available to your user when the reader begins waiting for input.
ReaderInputPrompt - Enum in com.stripe.stripeterminal
A ReaderInputPrompt represents any of the possible prompts to emitted by the reader as it is accepting input.
readSource() - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
Reads a payment method with the given parameters and returns a Stripe source.
retrievePaymentIntent(String, PaymentIntentCallback) - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
